attributes.action: Change law for only 6 people to meet per house hold to pulbic use common sence
attributes.additional_details: This effect our human rights i work in a school and can work with in a year group bubble of 300 students, but can not have my parents round as it will be over 6 people. The british public should use there common sence. How is it ok to sit in a pub full of strangers and but no ok to have my family in my own home.
attributes.background: Remove the law making it illegal for more than 6 people to meet in a house hold or out side a household and for the british puplic to use there common sence
